context.title: Papyrus File Choose
context.description: You can choose where you want to create your new Papyrus model. The name should end with .di
You should set the name of the Papyrus project folder, and you can set the name of the file created
You can select a diagram, set the name of the diagram, set the name of the root element of your model. You can also select one template to apply to your model
You should select the langage of your new diagram e.g. UML, Sysml, Profile, RobotML, ...
